content.question: The diagram shows the United States dollar-Chinese yuan foreign exchange market. If the current exchange rate is 6 yuan per dollar, which of the following describes the current state of the market and how the value of the dollar will change in a flexible exchange-rate system?

choices.label: There is a surplus of dollars and the dollar will appreciate.
There is a surplus of dollars and the yuan will depreciate.
There is a shortage of dollars and the dollar will appreciate.
There is a shortage of dollars and the dollar will depreciate.
There is a shortage of dollars and the yuan will appreciate.

content.answer: There is a shortage of dollars and the dollar will appreciate.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
